content.question: Dr. Stepnik is conducting a study to determine the best treatment for anorexia nervosa. Some of the participants have been through several treatment programs while others have not. Dr. Stepnik decides to let the participants who have never been treated before to be in Group 1, while the other participants are all assigned to Group 2. Which of the following terms best identifies Dr. Stepnik's decision not to randomly assign the participants to the groups?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
